relatedBlades.title: Try the leading cloud email security solution
relatedBlades.subtitle: Ditch the hardware and experience the speed and simplicity of modern cloud email security
relatedBlades.copy:
Email is the #1 way organizations communicate — and the #1 attack vector. Remove implicit trust from your inbox with Cloudflare's cloud email security, and keep your employees and data safe with seamless protection that won't disrupt your business.

With Cloudflare's cloud email security, organizations can:

- __Launch a free trial in minutes__ – with nothing to install, no messy rip-and-replace, and no email flow disruption.
- __Stop the most advanced email-borne threats__ by augmenting native security offered by cloud email providers to stop multi-channel phishing, Business Email Compromise (BEC), and other targeted attacks.
- __Leverage real-time threat intelligence and advanced ML__, powered by Cloudflare's global network, to achieve superior detection rates.
- __Protect users and data across every channel__ with email security that's part of a fully-integrated Zero Trust platform.
- __Get Zero Trust protection__ against a broad spectrum of threats, including malware-less BEC, multi-channel phishing, credential harvesting, and other targeted attacks. 

All in a cloud-native service that can be deployed in minutes.
